name: Sail Quest
description:
Sail Quest! Take control of your ship and explore the seas. Help others and discover the power of friendship. Pass through the maelstrom and face the dangers on the other side. Use your skills to face and overcome whatever stands in your way.

Sail Quest  is an RPG created in Bitsy for UCSC's Games and Playable Media MS course, GAME 231: Game Technologies. The challenge was to learn Bitsy and create a game within a week.
